Award Type: DIRECT PAYMENT FOR SPECIFIED USE, AS A SUBSIDY OR OTHER NON-REIMBURSABLE DIRECT FINANCIAL AID (C)
Description: THE TANKER SECURITY PROGRAM (TSP) ENSURES THAT A CORE FLEET OF U.S.-BASED PRODUCT TANKERS CAN OPERATE COMPETITIVELY IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE AND ENHANCE U.S. SUPPLY CHAIN RESILIENCY FOR LIQUID FUEL PRODUCTS. THIS AWARD PROVIDES THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE WITH ASSURED ACCESS TO CROWLEYSTENA MARINE SOLUTIONS VESSEL THAT MAY BE USED TO SUPPLY THE ARMED FORCES WITH FUEL DURING TIMES OF ARMED CONFLICT OR NATIONAL EMERGENCY. ?
